steps.modified_description: Take-Take a microwavable mug which is soiled and not clean

steps.description: add-Measure 1/16 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug
steps.modified_description: add-Measure 1 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug

errors.description: add-Measure 1 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug instead of 1/16 teaspoon

steps.description: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and add it to the mug
steps.modified_description: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and add it to the mug

steps.description: add-Measure 4 tablespoons of flour and add it to the mug
steps.modified_description: add-Measure 2 tablespoons of flour and add it to the mug

errors.description: add only 2 tbsp of flours instead of 4 tbsp of flour.
spill while adding and add only 2 tbsp instead of 4tbsp

steps.description: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of salt and add it to the mug
steps.modified_description: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of salt and add it to the mug

steps.description: Stir-Stir the contents in the mug well
steps.modified_description: Stir-Stir the contents in the mug improperly with hand

errors.description: use hand instead of utensil to stir

steps.description: Add-1 tablespoon of olive oil to the mug
steps.modified_description: Add-1 tablespoon of olive oil to the mug and invert tablespoon to measure

steps.description: Add-Add in 3 tablespoons of milk to the mug
Sprinkle-Sprinkle dried Italian herbs inside the mug
spread-spread marinara sauce around the surface of the batter
steps.modified_description: spread-mix marinara sauce with the batter batter

errors.description: instead of spreading on top mix it with contents of the mug

steps.description: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 generous tablespoon of mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce
Mix-Mix the contents of the mug thoroughly. (There might be some lumps, but that is ok.)
Microwave-Microwave for 1 minute 20 seconds, or until it rises and the toppings are bubbling
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave for 2 minute, or until it rises and the toppings are bubbling
